name: DiscoShips
description:
DiscoShips is a 2D top down, twin-stick, local multiplayer space shooter featuring original funky tunes.  The main mechanic is that your ammo is your health, so precise shots and resource management is required to dominate your opponents! In the midst of battle a variety of space junk will fly in to create choke points, disrupt the battle, and release more health and power ups to fuel your fight!

The game is still in development!

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/discoships

Check out our Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/WhiteboardGameStudios/
